body: The following simple templates can be used to turn any monster into a mythic creature. A creature given one of these templates counts as a mythic creature for the purposes of spells, abilities, and magic items even though it doesn't have the mythic subtype. Note that because it doesn't have the mythic subtype, it doesn't gain the many benefits of having the mythic subtype—the creature only gains the benefits described in the simple template.
name: Mythic Simple Templates
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates

sections.body: Creatures with the agile template are quick and deadly, moving faster than their normal counterparts and striking with incredible speed and agility. An agile creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
sections.name: Agile (MR 1, CR +1)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Agile (MR 1/CR +1)

sections.body: Init +20 bonus; AC +2 dodge bonus; hp mythic bonus hit points; Defensive Abilities evasion (as the rogue class feature); Speed +30 feet for all movement types (up to double the creature's base movement speed); Special Attacks dual initiative.
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Agile (MR 1/CR +1)/Rebuild Rules
sections.name: Rebuild Rules

sections.body: Creatures with the arcane template are infused with arcane power, capable of casting a limited number of arcane spells. If the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice, this simple template grants a mythic rank of 2 instead of 1. An arcane creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
sections.name: Arcane (MR 1 or 2, CR +1)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Arcane (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)

sections.body: AC +2 deflection bonus; hp mythic bonus hit points; SR gains SR equal to its new CR + 11; Special Attacks mythic magic, simple arcane spellcasting.
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Arcane (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)/Rebuild Rules
sections.name: Rebuild Rules

sections.body: Creatures with the divine template can call upon the power of the gods, allowing them to cast a limited number of divine spells. If the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice, this simple template grants a mythic rank of 2 instead of 1. A divine creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
sections.name: Divine (MR 1 or 2, CR +1)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Divine (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)

sections.body: Aura aura of grace (creature and all allies within 10 feet receive a +2 sacred bonus on saving throws—or a profane bonus if the templated creature is evil); AC +2 deflection bonus; hp mythic bonus hit points; Special Attacks mythic magic, simple divine spellcasting.
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Divine (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)/Rebuild Rules
sections.name: Rebuild Rules

sections.body: Creatures with the invincible template are incredibly difficult to harm. They can withstand immense punishment and continue to fight. If the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice, this simple template grants a mythic rank of 2 instead of 1. An invincible creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
sections.name: Invincible (MR 1 or 2, CR +1)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Invincible (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)

sections.body: AC increase natural armor bonus by 2 (or 4 if the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice); hp mythic bonus hit points; Defensive Abilities gains DR and resistance to all types of energy as per the table below, as well as block attacks and second save.
sections.name: Rebuild Rules
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Invincible (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)/Rebuild Rules
pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Invincible (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)/Rebuild Rules/Invincible Template Defenses
sections.name: Invincible Template Defenses

sections.body: Creatures with the savage template are untamed, primordial versions of their non-mythic cousins. Their claws are sharper, their fangs larger, and their hides thicker. If the creature has 11 or more Hit Dice, this simple template grants a mythic rank of 2 instead of 1. A savage creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.
sections.name: Savage (MR 1 or 2, CR +1)
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Monsters/Mythic Monster Advancement/Mythic Simple Templates/Savage (MR 1 or 2/CR +1)

sections.body: AC increase natural armor bonus by 2; hp mythic bonus hit points; Defensive Abilities gains DR and resistance to all types of energy as per the table below; Special Attacks all attacks gain bleed 1 (this stacks with itself), feral savagery (full attack).
